subject: Plus x haptics.
description_text:
I recently  purchased the plus x pedals and vam pro haptics. I'd like to
get the brackets to mount the haptics for the brake and gas pedal
horizontal. What product is that?

Thank you
Justin Jknes

conversations.body_text: Hi Justin Jones,     Please check this link to see the bracket for horizontally mounting the motor.Â   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-haptic-reactor-mounting-brackets
